Entities.Name: HEPATOPATHY
Entities.Definition: Type of hepatopathy found in the patient.

Entities.Name: TUMOR_SIZE
Entities.Definition: Size of the liver tumor detected.

Entities.Name: PROCEDURE
Entities.Definition: Medical procedure performed on the patient.

Dataset.Name: Synthetic Computed Tomography Scan Reports
Dataset.Details: This dataset consists of 197 synthetic CT scan reports generated and annotated using an LLM, designed to replicate real-world medical reports for NER training.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: The synthetic reports were generated using a large language model trained on real-world data, then semi-automatically annotated under human supervision to ensure accuracy and relevance of annotations.
